thread.title: BRIEF-Warrior Met Coal Announces Launch Of Consent Solicitation Relating To 8 Pct Senior Secured Notes Due 2024

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Warrior Met Coal Announces Launch Of Consent Solicitation Relating To 8 Pct Senior Secured Notes Due 2024
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Warrior Met Coal Inc:
* WARRIOR MET COAL ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF CONSENT SOLICITATION RELATING TO ITS 8.00% SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2024
* WARRIOR MET COAL INC - CONSENT SOLICITATION WILL EXPIRE AT 5:00 P.M., NEW YORK CITY TIME, ON MARCH 2, 2018
* WARRIOR MET COAL - ‍COMMENCEMENT OF CONSENT SOLICITATION FOR $350.0 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 8.00% SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2024​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
